Humongous Db Back To Documents

05 April 2013

Below is the presentation on MongoDb basic which is given by me, it is short and covered a lot of enlightened point which is really helpful for the people who are novice in MongoBb. Here we not only discuss the importance of MongoBb, but also a different scenario where SQL and No SQL (i.e No Only SQL) is good and each one possess their own importance. Also some info about 10Gen's support for MongoBb users.

Hu mongous db v2 from Vivek Parihar
